1. Create MVC Web Application by Empty MVC ,,, // to do 1. MVC login in 2. MVC API 3. Action result: ActionResult is an abstract class that represents the result of an action method. The class itself inherits from System.Object, and only adds one additional abstract method: ExecuteResult, which is an abstract method that the derived classes of ActionResult will implement themselves. https://www.exceptionnotfound.net/asp-net-mvc-demystified-actionresults/ 4. devtool: 'cheap-module-eval-source-map', in webpack
